cards.name: King Stannis's Host
cards.text:
Assault. No attachments. Renown.
While you control Stannis Baratheon, he gains stealth.
During [power] challenges, each participating character an opponent controls gets -1 STR.

cards.name: Beric Dondarrion
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Beric Dondarrion is attacking, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the round, that character cannot kneel or stand. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Salladhor Saan's Lyseni
cards.text: Assault. No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Salladhor Saan's Lyseni is attacking, it gains 1 power for every 2 kneeling locations the defending player controls. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Stannis Baratheon
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to a character, kneel a non-limited location to choose and kneel a character. (Limit once per phase.) Draft format only.
cards.flavor: "Stannis is pure iron, black and hard and strong, yes, but brittle, the way iron gets. He'll break before he bends." <cite>Donal Noye</cite>

cards.name: Ser Richard Horpe
cards.text: Renown. Ser Richard Horpe gets +1 STR for each power he has. Action: Move 1 power from a card you control to another card in play. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Storm's End
cards.text: During the challenges phase, characters without a [power] icon cannot stand. Reaction: After a [military] or [intrigue] challenge is initiated by or against you, kneel Storm's End to change the challenge type to [power].

cards.name: The Laughing Storm
cards.text: Non-limited location you control only. While The Laughing Storm is standing, cards cannot be discarded at random from your hand. Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel The Laughing Storm to choose and kneel a character controlled by the losing opponent. Draft format only.
cards.designer: Card inspired by 2010 Joust World Champion, Alec Irwin.

cards.name: Robert's Rebellion
cards.text: Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have lost a [power] challenge this phase, discard 3 power from your faction card.
cards.flavor: "In my dreams, I kill him every night." <cite>Robert Baratheon</cite>

cards.name: Gendry
cards.text: While you control no loyal characters, Gendry gains renown. Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, choose a non-loyal character with a Weapon attachment. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains each of Gendry's keywords.

cards.name: Bonifer the Good
cards.text: Each non-neutral The Seven character you control gains insight.
cards.flavor: "The Crone will light our way, and the Warrior will give strength to our arms."

cards.name: Ser Gilbert Farring
cards.text: During a challenge in which a participating character has assault, Ser Gilbert Farring gets +1 STR and gains renown.
cards.flavor: "A few good men remain, it's true. Ser Gilbert Farring holds Storm's End for me still, with two hundred loyal men." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>

cards.name: Jon Arryn
cards.text: Insight. Renown. Jon Arryn cannot be saved. Forced Interrupt: When Jon Arryn is killed, each player may either: draw 2 cards, or gain 1 power for their faction.

cards.name: Ser Clayton Suggs
cards.text: Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to a character, that character gets +1 STR or -1 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
cards.flavor: "What sort of god lets himself be pissed upon by dogs?"

cards.name: Godry the Giantslayer
cards.text: Bestow (1). X is the number of gold Godry the Giantslayer has. While he has 5 or more gold, he gains intimidate. Reaction: After you marshal or play another Knight or R'hllor card, Godry the Giantslayer gains 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: "I have slain a giant, boy. Why should I fear some flea-ridden northman who paints one on his shield?"

cards.name: No Song So Sweet
cards.text: Action: During a [power] challenge, choose a standing [baratheon] character you control and have it participate in the challenge on your side. Reaction: After you play a Song event, pay 1 gold to return No Song So Sweet from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Set Down Our Deeds
cards.text: Action: Kneel your faction card to discard up to 3 power from a card you own. Draw 2 cards for each power discarded this way.
cards.flavor: Ser Cortnay Penrose wore no armor. He sat a sorrel stallion, his standard-bearer a dapple grey. Above them flapped Baratheon's crowned stag and the crossed quills of Penrose, white on a russet field.

cards.name: Myrish Pirates
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Myrish Pirates enters play during the challenges phase, move 1 power or 1 gold from a character you do not control to a character you control. Draft format only.

cards.name: Blackhaven Rider
cards.text: Reaction: After Blackhaven Rider enters play, each player must choose and kneel a loyal character they control, if able.
cards.flavor: “Robert is slain, but his realm remains. And we defend her.” - Beric Dondarrion

cards.name: The Holy Hundred
cards.text: Assault. No attachments except Weapon. Each The Seven character you control gets +1 STR.
cards.flavor: "They pray well, I suppose, but can they fight?" <cite>Jaime Lannister</cite>

cards.name: Acolyte of the Shadow
cards.text: While an opponent controls a card in shadows, Acolyte of the Shadow gains insight.
cards.flavor: "Shadows are the servants of light, the children of fire." -Melisandre

cards.name: Antler Men
cards.text: Reaction: After power is moved to your faction card, gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per round.)
cards.flavor: "They call themselves the Antler Men, after the crowned stag." <cite>Varys</cite>

cards.name: Sellsails
cards.text: Bestow (2). Action: Discard 1 gold from Sellsails to choose and stand a Mercenary or Raider card. (Limit once per phase.) Draft format only.
cards.flavor: The striped hulls of Lysene war galleys had been seen offshore, and Varys had reports from Myr of sellsail captains taking service with Dragonstone.

cards.name: Nightfort Ruins
cards.text: Bestow (2). Nightfort Ruins contributes X STR to your side during any [power] challenge in which you control a participating character. X is the number of gold Nightfort Ruins has. +1 Reserve. Draft format only.

cards.name: Flaming Sword
cards.text: Attached character gains a [power] icon and intimidate. Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if attached character was declared as an attacker this phase, sacrifice Flaming Sword. Draft format only.
cards.flavor: "It's only a trick, I told you. The wildfire ruins the steel." <cite>Gendry</cite>

cards.name: Euron Crow's Eye
cards.text: Intimidate. Pillage. Reaction: After a character you control discards a non-character card using pillage, that character gains 1 power. (Limit twice per round.) Draft format only.
cards.flavor: "Balon was mad, Aeron is madder, and Euron is maddest of them all" <cite>Baelor Blacktyde</cite>

cards.name: Ralf the Limper
cards.text: Pillage. Shadow (5). Reaction: After a non-character card is discarded from an opponent's deck, choose a card you control with shadow and return it to shadows. (Limit twice per round.)
cards.flavor: "The Crow's Eye has been too long away. He knows us not."

cards.name: Victarion Greyjoy
cards.text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel a character you control. If it has the: - R’hllor trait, Victarion Greyjoy gains insight and "immune to opponents' character abilities" until the end of the phase. - Drowned God or Raider trait, Victarion Greyjoy gains renown and cannot be killed until the end of the phase. Draft format only.

cards.name: Ralf Kenning
cards.text: Pillage. While there is a Winter plot card revealed, reduce the income and reserve values on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.
cards.designer: Card design by 2017 Castle Stahleck Joust Champion, Martí Foz Hernàndez.

cards.name: Erik Anvil-Breaker
cards.text:
Intimidate. Pillage. Renown.
Erik Anvil-Breaker cannot stand during the standing phase.
cards.flavor: "Stand up, Erik. Stand up and I'll shout your name with all the rest. Stand up and I'll be the first to follow you." <cite>Asha Greyjoy</cite>

cards.name: Winterfell
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Winterfell to choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the phase, take control of that character. -2 Initiative.

cards.name: Valyrian Steel Armor
cards.text: If attached character is Euron Crow's Eye, he gains insight. While you control no non-Army characters with printed cost 6 or higher other than attached character, attached character cannot be killed or discarded from play.

cards.name: Cast Me Forth
cards.text: You may ambush non-unique Drowned God or Raider characters from your dead pile as if they were in your hand. Each Drowned God or Raider character in your hand or dead pile gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost. Draft format only.
cards.flavor: "When he cast me forth again he gave me eyes to see, ears to hear, and a voice to spread his word, that I might be his prophet and teach his truth to those who have forgotten." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>

cards.name: The Knight
cards.text: Pillage. Action: During a challenge in which you are the attacking player, return 2 characters from the defending player's discard pile to their owner's hand. Then, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

cards.name: Dagmer Cleftjaw
cards.text: Pillage. Shadow (4). Stealth. While there is a Winter plot card revealed, you may marshal Dagmer Cleftjaw into shadows from your dead pile as if he were in your hand.
cards.flavor: "Dagmer lives, be grateful for that much." <cite>Asha Greyjoy</cite>

cards.name: Left-Hand Lucas Codd
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After no defenders are declared in a challenge in which you control an attacking Raider character, place 1 gold from the treasury on a card.
cards.flavor: "I am unwed."

cards.name: Black Lorren
cards.text: Bestow (1). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Black Lorren is attacking, discard 1 gold from an attacking Raider character to choose and kill a defending character.
cards.flavor: "The singers call Andrik best now. And Black Lorren and Qarl the Maid are near as dread." <cite>Dagmer Cleftjaw</cite>

cards.name: Moqorro
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Moqorro comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [intrigue] icon and stealth.
cards.flavor: "Every night in my fires I glimpse the glory that awaits you."

cards.name: Cragorn
cards.text: Bestow (3). Challenges Action: Discard 1 gold from a Raider character to search the top 10 cards of your deck for an Item or Weapon attachment with printed cost 3 or lower and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Silence
cards.text: Each Raider character you control gains pillage. While an opponent has 10 or more cards in their discard pile, each Raider character you control gets +1 STR.

cards.name: Saltcliffe
cards.text: Action: Kneel Saltcliffe to move 1 gold from the treasury or a card in play to a Raider character without gold.
cards.flavor: The islands are stern and stony places, scant of comfort and bleak of prospect. Death is never far here, and life is mean and meager.

cards.name: Fleet from Ten Towers
cards.text:
Assault. No attachments.
While Fleet from Ten Towers is attacking an opponent whose reserve value is 4 or lower, it gets +3 STR and gains renown.

cards.name: Great Kraken's Crew
cards.text: No attachments. Shadow (2). Reaction: After Great Kraken's Crew comes out of shadows during a challenge, choose a defending character with printed cost 3 or lower. That character does not contribute its STR to this challenge.

cards.name: Saltcliffe Marauder
cards.text: Bestow (3). Pillage. While Saltcliffe Marauder has 1 or more gold, it gains stealth.Action: Discard 1 gold from Saltcliffe Marauder to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth. Draft format only.

cards.name: Harlaw Scout
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After an opponent discards 1 or more cards for reserve, gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Old Captain
cards.text: While Old Captain is standing, it gains pillage and renown.
cards.flavor: It was said that the ironmen of old had oft been blood-drunk in battle, so berserk that they felt no pain and feared no foe.

cards.name: Stony Shore Thrall
cards.text: Reaction: After a card enters play during the challenges phase, kneel Stony Shore Thrall to choose an opponent. Until that player reveals a new plot card, reduce the reserve value on their revealed plot card by 1 (to a minimum of 2). Then, you may have each player check reserve. Draft format only.

cards.name: Kraken's Hatchet
cards.text: Attached character gets +1 STR and gains the Raider trait. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is attacking, pay 2 gold or discard 1 gold from attached character to stand it. (Limit once per round.) Draft format only.

cards.name: Though All Men Do Despise Us
cards.text: Reaction: After no defenders are declared, each attacking Raider character gains 1 power. (Max 1 per challenge.)
cards.flavor: The Codds were not well regarded in the Iron Islands; the men were said to be thieves and cowards, the women wantons who bedded with their own fathers and brothers.

cards.name: Tywin Lannister
cards.text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Tywin Lannister is participating, he gains 1 power for every 3 gold in your gold pool. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: "Nothing is won so long as we have enemies in the field..."

cards.name: Ser Daven Lannister
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After Ser Daven Lannister gains 1 or more power, each opponent must choose and discard 1 card from their hand. Then, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Ser Jaime Lannister
cards.text: Renown. Forced Reaction: After a character enters play during the challenges phase, stand Ser Jaime Lannister. Then, discard that character from play.

cards.name: Ser Lancel Lannister
cards.text: Power on Lord or Lady characters does not count towards their controllers' power total. Action: Kneel Ser Lancel Lannister to put a The Seven character into play from your hand or discard pile.
cards.flavor: "On the morrow I will return to King's Landing and swear my sword to the new High Septon and the Seven. I mean to take vows and join the Warrior's Sons."

cards.name: Tommen Baratheon
cards.text: Tommen Baratheon contributes his STR to your total for dominance even while kneeling. While you control: - 1 or more Cat cards, he gains an [intrigue] icon. - 2 or more Cat cards, he gains insight. - 3 or more Cat cards, he gets +3 STR. Draft format only.

cards.name: Casterly Rock
cards.text: While Casterly Rock is standing, you may spend gold on [lannister] cards you control as if it were in your gold pool. Marshaling Action: Kneel Casterly Rock to choose up to 3 cards. Each of those cards gains 1 gold.

cards.name: Lannisport
cards.text: Reaction: After a [power] challenge is initiated against you, kneel Lannisport to end the challenge with no winner or loser unless the attacking player chooses and discards 1 card from their hand. +1 Income.

cards.name: The Sack of King's Landing
cards.text: During [intrigue] challenges, each character you control gains pillage. Reaction: After a location enters an opponent's discard pile, that player must choose and kill a character they control with the same printed cost. Draft format only.

cards.name: Ser Addam Marbrand
cards.text: Reaction: After an Army or Knight card enters play under your control, Ser Addam Marbrand gains 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.) Reaction: After a character enters your discard pile, discard 1 gold from Ser Addam Marbrand to return it to your hand. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Ser Harys Swyft
cards.text: Action: Move 1 gold from your gold pool to a card without gold. (Limit twice per round.) +1 Income.

cards.name: Bronn
cards.text: Bestow (3). No attachments except Weapon. Bronn gets +2 STR for each gold he has. Interrupt: When a Lord or Lady character would be killed, discard each gold (cannot be 0) from Bronn to save it. Then, if that character was Tyrion Lannister, you may return Bronn to your hand.

cards.name: Myrcella Baratheon
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Myrcella Baratheon is participating, return her to your hand. Then, you may initiate an additional [intrigue] challenge against the losing opponent this phase. (Max once per phase.)

cards.name: Ser Boros Blount
cards.text: Ambush (3). Shadow (1). Reaction: After Ser Boros Blount enters play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Kingsguard character or a non-[lannister] Knight character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play.

cards.name: Boots
cards.text:
Unique character with printed cost 3 or lower only. Ambush (1).
Attached character gains renown.

cards.name: Lady Whiskers
cards.text:
Unique character with printed cost 3 or lower only. Ambush (1).
If attached character is Tommen Baratheon, he gains stealth.
Attached character does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [power] challenge.

cards.name: A Lannister's Honor
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge as the attacking player, the losing opponent must choose and kill a character with the lowest STR among characters they control. (Max 1 per challenge.)
cards.flavor: "The Lannisters have no honor." <cite>Ser Jorah Mormont</cite>

cards.name: Warrior's Sons
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to Warrior's Sons, stand Warrior's Sons. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Ashemark Councilor
cards.text: X is the number of cards with 1 or more gold. Reaction: After Ashemark Councilor enters play, choose up to 3 cards. Each of those cards gains 1 gold.

cards.name: Eager Opportunist
cards.text: Bestow (1). Challenges Action: Discard 1 gold from Eager Opportunist to put a character with printed cost 4 or lower into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play. (Limit once per phase.) Draft format only.

cards.name: The Imp's Agent
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Imp's Agent is participating, return it to shadows to have the losing opponent choose a card in their hand and place it on the top or bottom of their deck.

cards.name: Cruel Brigand
cards.text: Ambush (3). Reaction: After Cruel Brigand enters play, if you have won an [intrigue] challenge this phase, kneel your faction card to choose a character with STR 3 or lower and return it to its owner's hand. Draft format only.

cards.name: King's Landing Dromond
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reduce the number of unspent gold you return to the treasury during the taxation phase by 1. Reaction: After King's Landing Dromond comes out of shadows, choose a character with printed cost 2 or lower and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Silverhill River
cards.text: Reaction: After claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge you won, if you have more cards in hand than the losing opponent, sacrifice Silverhill River to gain 1 power for your faction. +1 Income. Draft format only.

cards.name: Burning Bright
cards.text: Action: Put an Army or Knight character into play from your discard pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play (cannot be saved).
cards.flavor: Ser Addam Marbrand had the command. Tyrion saw his banner unfurl as his standard-bearer shook it out; a burning tree, orange and smoke.

cards.name: Lord Anders's Host
cards.text: Ambush (8). Assault. No attachments. Reaction: After a card enters play from your hand or shadows area during a challenge, choose a participating character with a lower printed cost than that card's and return it to its owner's hand. (Limit once per round.) +1 Initiative

cards.name: Anders Yronwood
cards.text: Intimidate. While you are not the first player, each House Yronwood character you control does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the first challenge you initiate each phase.
cards.flavor: The most powerful of the Dornish lords was Anders Yronwood, the Bloodroyal, Lord of Yronwood and Warden of the Stone Way.

cards.name: Doran Martell
cards.text: Insight. Shadow (5). Each card you control in shadows gains shadow (X). X is that card's printed cost. Reaction: After you lose dominance, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Place 1 in shadows, and the other on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Ser Arys Oakheart
cards.text:
Renown.
While Ser Arys Oakheart is attacking, at least 1 character must be declared as a defender, if able.
cards.flavor: "You will not take her whilst I still draw breath."

cards.name: Arianne Martell
cards.text: Insight. Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice, and each non-Martell character you control gains that challenge icon. Then, return Arianne to your hand (cannot be saved). (Max once per round.) Draft format only.

cards.name: The Tattered Prince
cards.text: Bestow (2). Renown. Shadow (2). Forced Reaction: After a plot card enters your used pile, return The Tattered Prince to shadows unless you discard 1 gold from him.

cards.name: Sword of the Morning
cards.text: Unique character or House Dayne character only. While attached character is attacking, it gets +1 STR for each defending character. Reaction: After attached character is declared as an attacker, choose up to 3 characters controlled by the defending player. Each of those characters must be declared as a defender for this challenge, if able. Draft format only.

cards.name: The Dornish Wars
cards.text: Each character an opponent controls cannot gain challenge icons. Reaction: After you win a challenge, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Mellario of Norvos
cards.text:
While you have Arianne Martell in your hand, reduce the cost to marshal her by 1.
While you control:
- Doran Martell, he gains: "immune to opponents' plot effects."
- Quentyn Martell, he gets +2 STR.
- Trystane Martell, he gains insight.

cards.name: Ser Gulian Qorgyle
cards.text: Reaction: After a character an opponent controls is declared as an attacker or defender, it loses a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase. (Limit twice per phase.)
cards.flavor: "They're scorpions, ser. House Qorgyle of Sandstone, three scorpions black on red." <cite>Podrick Payne</cite>

cards.name: Trystane Martell
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Trystane Martell enters play, choose a character with no challenge icons and return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Tyene Sand
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After you lose dominance, move 1 power from the winning opponent's faction card to a character you control.
cards.flavor: "Doubt your little sister if you like, but never doubt our sire."

cards.name: Ser Willam Wells
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kill Ser Willam Wells to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a [military], an [intrigue], and a [power] icon.
cards.flavor: "Will will never have his wedding. Their deaths should have some meaning." <cite>Quentyn Martell</cite>

cards.name: Sandstone
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, kneel Sandstone to have an attacking character gain 1 power for each defending character with fewer than 2 challenge icons (to a maximum of 3 power).

cards.name: War Scorpion
cards.text: Ambush (3). Attached character gets +2 STR. Challenges Action: Sacrifice War Scorpion to choose an attacking character, and remove it from the challenge. (You may kill that character instead if it has the Army or Dragon trait.)

cards.name: Vulture King
cards.text: Attached character gains pillage. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, discard the top card of your deck to choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice.

cards.name: Ghost Hill Elite
cards.text: Ambush (6). No attachments. Reaction: After Ghost Hill Elite enters play, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses an [intrigue] or [power] icon and Ghost Hill Elite gains that icon. Then, if that character has no challenge icons, kill it.

cards.name: Starfall Servant
cards.text: Shadow (3). Stealth. Reaction: After Starfall Servant enters play, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. Draft format only.

cards.name: Scheming Snake
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Scheming Snake enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons. That character does not contribute its STR to this challenge.

cards.name: Windblown
cards.text: Assault. Shadow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Windblown is participating, return it to shadows to choose and stand an Army or Mercenary character.
cards.flavor: The men of the Windblown used what names they would, and changed them at a whim.

cards.name: Desert Freerider
cards.text: Bestow (2). Challenges Action: Discard 1 gold from Desert Freerider to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains or loses an [intrigue] icon. Draft format only.

cards.name: Vengeful Lordling
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Vengeful Lordling is participating, reduce the cost of the next card you ambush or bring out of shadows this phase by 1. Draft format only.

cards.name: Dornish Sloop
cards.text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After Dornish Sloop comes out of shadows, choose a character with printed cost 5 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. +1 Reserve.

cards.name: A Bed of Scorpions
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, choose and kill a participating character. (Max 1 per challenge.)
cards.flavor: Lord Tyrell and his train traveled to Sandstone, where his lordship was murdered in a bed of scorpions.

cards.name: Great Ranging
cards.text: Assault. Insight. Intimidate. No attachments. Reaction: After you marshal Great Ranging, search your deck and discard pile for a non-limited location and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. +1 Reserve. Draft format only.

cards.name: Melisandre
cards.text: Insight. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Melisandre is attacking, sacrifice another character to choose a non-loyal character with lower printed cost and take control of it. (Limit once per round.) Draft format only.
cards.flavor: "I pray for a glimpse of Azor Ahai, and R'hllor shows me only Snow."

cards.name: Benjen Stark
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which Benjen Stark is attacking, name a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, the losing opponent cannot initiate challenges of that type against you.
cards.flavor: "Our wife is duty. Our mistress is honor."

cards.name: Dywen
cards.text:
Stealth.
Each [thenightswatch] character you control with stealth does not kneel when declared as an attacker during a [military] challenge.
+1 Reserve.

cards.name: Bowen Marsh
cards.text: Insight. Shadow (4). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, choose a character and a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker in challenges of that type. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

cards.name: Castle Black
cards.text: Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, choose and stand a [thenightswatch] character or Castle Black. (Limit once per phase.) Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's triggered location ability would initiate, kneel Castle Black to cancel those effects.

cards.name: Sentinel Stand
cards.text: While Sentinel Stand is standing, each character you control with 1 or fewer challenge icons gets +2 STR.
cards.flavor: The other keeps, long deserted, were lonely, haunted places, where cold winds whistled through black windows and the spirits of the dead manned the parapets.

cards.name: The Watch Needs Good Men
cards.text: You may marshal or ambush characters from any opponent's discard pile as if they were in your hand.

cards.name: Samwell Tarly
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Samwell Tarly is participating, if your reserve value is: - 6 or higher, draw 1 card. - 8 or higher, gain 1 power for your faction. - 10 or higher, choose and stand another character that shares a Trait with him, if able.

cards.name: Iron Emmett
cards.text:
Stealth.
While Iron Emmett is kneeling, characters with a [military] icon cannot enter play during the challenges phase.
cards.flavor: "I hope this don't mean I can't beat the bloody piss out of you next time we train, my lord."

cards.name: Old Tattersalt
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Old Tattersalt enters play, search the top X cards of your deck for a card with printed cost 1 or lower, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. X is your reserve value. Action: Kneel a non-limited location to return Old Tattersalt to shadows. Draft format only.

cards.name: Gared
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When an Omen plot card is revealed, kneel each opponent's faction card.
cards.flavor: “Everyone talks about snows forty foot deep, and how the ice wind comes howling out of the north, but the real enemy is the cold.”

cards.name: Lord Steward
cards.text: Unique character only. Attached character gains an [intrigue] icon and the Steward trait. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which you control a participating Steward character, choose a character with printed cost X or lower controlled by the losing opponent. Take control of it until the end of the phase. X is the number of Steward characters you control. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Insubordination
cards.text: Terminal. Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you in which attached character is attacking alone, kneel Insubordination to kill attached character.
cards.flavor: "Do you hear me, boy? I will not have it!" <cite>Janos Slynt</cite>

cards.name: I Pledge My Life and Honor
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a [thenightswatch] character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. Then, sacrifice a character that shares a Trait with that character.
cards.flavor: ...to the Night's Watch, for this night and all the nights to come.

cards.name: When All Is Darkest
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After a character comes out of shadows, kneel your faction card to take control of that character.
cards.flavor: "If the Wall falls, night falls as well, the long night that never ends." <cite>Melisandre</cite>

cards.name: Tormund's Horde
cards.text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Tormund's Horde is attacking, reveal the top card of each player's deck. You may either: discard each of those cards, or have each player draw 1 card. Draft format only.

cards.name: Abel's Washerwoman
cards.text: Action: Kneel a non-limited location to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains pillage or stealth. (Limit once per round.) Draft format only.
cards.flavor: Lord Manderly had brought musicians from White Harbor, but none were singers, so when Abel turned up at the gates with a lute and six women, he had been made welcome.

cards.name: Marsh's Conspirator
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Marsh's Conspirator comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Old Steward
cards.text: +1 Reserve.

cards.name: Wall-Bound Knight
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Wall-Bound Knight enters play during the challenges phase, move 1 gold from an opponent's gold pool or a card an opponent controls to your gold pool. Draft format only.

cards.name: Highborn Recruit
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Highborn Recruit to choose a character with 1 or fewer challenge icons. Until the end of the phase, that character gains insight or renown.

cards.name: Grey Galley
cards.text:
Shadow (1).
Grey Galley contributes 1 STR to your side during any challenge in which you control a defending character. (3 STR instead if Grey Galley came out of shadows this phase.)

cards.name: You Know Nothing
cards.text: Challenges Action: Until the end of the phase, each non-Army character an opponent controls loses all keywords.
cards.flavor: "I know nothing, Ygritte, and perhaps I never will." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>

cards.name: Robb Stark
cards.text: Intimidate. Renown. Action: Kneel a non-limited location to choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, it gets +X STR, where X is that location's printed cost. (1 higher instead if you control Grey Wind.) (Limit twice per round.) Draft format only.

cards.name: Roose Bolton
cards.text: Intimidate. Shadow (5). Reaction: After Roose Bolton comes out of shadows during a challenge, kill each participating loyal character.
cards.flavor: "A peaceful land, a quiet people."

cards.name: The Blackfish
cards.text: Renown. Stealth. Each [stark] Army character you control gains an [intrigue] icon.
cards.flavor: Ser Brynden Tully was Robb's eyes and ears, the commander of his scouts and outriders.

cards.name: Tytos Blackwood
cards.text: Renown. While Tytos Blackwood is participating in a challenge, treat each other character without power as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Rickard Karstark
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel a non-limited location to have each player sacrifice a character or location. (Limit once per phase.) Reaction: After a Winter plot card is revealed, return a non-limited location from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit once per phase.) Draft format only.

cards.name: The Crag
cards.text: You cannot initiate [intrigue] challenges. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge as the attacking player, The Crag gains 1 power. (2 power instead if you control a [stark] King character.) (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Grey Wind
cards.text: Unique [stark] character only. Attached character gains stealth. Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered character ability would initiate, return a Direwolf card to your hand to cancel those effects. (Limit once per phase.) Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Grey Wind to a different character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: The Hour of the Wolf
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player sacrifices a non-loyal character, if able.
cards.flavor: “The winters are hard, but the Starks will endure. We always have.” - Eddard Stark

cards.name: King Robb's Bannermen
cards.text: Assault. No attachments except Direwolf. While you control a [stark] King character, King Robb’s Bannermen may target an additional location using assault.
cards.flavor: She had insisted that he be guarded as well, and the lords bannermen had agreed.

cards.name: Bran Stark
cards.text: Each Old Gods character you control cannot be knelt by card effects. Interrupt: When claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge in which you control a participating Old Gods character, instead of the normal claim effects, look at the defending player's hand. Choose and discard X cards from that hand, if able. X is the claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card.

cards.name: Jon Snow
cards.text: No attachments except Direwolf. Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] challenge, either: standing characters, or kneeling characters must be chosen for claim during this challenge, if able.
cards.designer: Card design by 2019 Melee World Champion, Richard Walker.

cards.name: Farlen
cards.text: Each unique Direwolf character you control gains renown. Reaction: After you marshal Farlen, search your hand, deck, and discard pile for The Wolfswood and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Ghost
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking character that is a Direwolf or has a Direwolf attachment, draw 1 card. Interrupt: When Jon Snow would be killed, sacrifice Ghost to save him. Draft format only.
cards.designer: Card design by 2019 European Melee Champion, Chris Meeuwsen.

cards.name: Harwin
cards.text: Bestow (2). No attachments except Warhorse. Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating non-loyal character, discard 1 gold from Harwin to choose a character you control with 2 or more keywords and have it participate in the challenge on your side. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: The Wolf's Den
cards.text: Reaction: After a character you control is sacrificed or killed, kneel The Wolf's Den to place the bottom card of your deck in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.

cards.name: Greywater Watch
cards.text: Shadow (1). Action: Kneel and return Greywater Watch to shadows and kneel a [stark] character to have it participate in the current challenge on your side. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: The Bastard's Boys
cards.text: Assault. Challenges Action: Sacrifice The Bastard's Boys to put a House Bolton or non-[stark] character with printed cost 5 or lower into play from your hand.
cards.flavor: When the tale reached Lord Ramsay, he sent his Bastard's Boys to seize the man and drag him out into the snow.

cards.name: Crannogmen
cards.text: Shadow (3). Interrupt: When claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge in which Crannogmen is attacking, return it to shadows to choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower controlled by the losing opponent. Instead of the normal claim effects, kill that character.

cards.name: Merman's Guard
cards.text: Bestow (2). Reaction: After Merman's Guard is declared as an attacker or defender, kneel your faction card and discard 1 gold from Merman's Guard to choose and stand a unique character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown. Draft format only.

cards.name: Trident Guard
cards.text: While your claim value is higher than an opponent's, Trident Guard gains renown.
cards.flavor: "They shall not cross." <cite>Ser Edmure Tully</cite>

cards.name: Brynden's Outriders
cards.text: Assault. No attachments. While you control a non-limited location, Brynden's Outriders gains stealth. While you control a Commander character, Brynden's Outriders gains a [power] icon. Draft format only.

cards.name: Karstark Lancer
cards.text: Interrupt: When Karstark Lancer is sacrificed or killed, each player chooses a location they control, if able. Each of those locations gains 1 power.
cards.flavor: "Rickard Karstark killed more than a Frey and a Lannister. He killed my honor." <cite>Robb Stark</cite>

cards.name: The Wolfswood
cards.text: Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, kneel and sacrifice The Wolfswood to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Max 1 per challenge.) +1 Initiative. Draft format only.

cards.name: Wolf Dreams
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose an attacking character you control and name a Trait. Until the end of the end of the challenge, it gets +2 STR, then attach Wolf Dreams to that character as a Direwolf attachment with the text: 'Terminal. Attached character gains the named Trait.' (Max 1 per phase.) Draft format only.

cards.name: Aegon Targaryen
cards.text: Renown. Shadow (6). Reaction: After a non-loyal [targaryen] character enters play during the challenges phase, stand Aegon Targaryen. (Limit twice per phase.)
cards.flavor: "Daenerys is Prince Rhaegar's sister but I am Rhaegar's son. I am the only dragon you need."

cards.name: Ser Barristan Selmy
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Barristan Selmy is participating, discard 1 card from your hand to, either: stand each defending Knight character, or raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Daenerys Targaryen
cards.text: Insight. While you control Ser Barristan Selmy, he gains intimidate. Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, gain 1 power for your faction for each unique attacking Mercenary character. (Limit once per phase.) Draft format only.
cards.designer: Card design by 2019 Joust World Champion, Francis Côté.

cards.name: Magister Illyrio
cards.text: Insight. Shadow (5). Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, gain 1 gold for every 2 cards in shadows. +1 Income.

cards.name: Lysono Maar
cards.text: Insight. During the first challenge you initiate each phase, defenders are declared before you declare attackers. (Attackers and defenders are knelt simultaneously as part of initiating the challenge.)
cards.designer: Card design by 2017 European Joust Champion, Reinhard Schefcik.

cards.name: Quentyn Martell
cards.text: Shadow (4). Action: Return Quentyn Martell to shadows to put a character with lower STR than his into play from your hand or shadows area. At the end of the phase, if it is still in play, return it to your hand. (Max once per round.) Draft format only.
cards.flavor: Oh, he thought. Then he began to scream.

cards.name: Ser Harry Strickland
cards.text: Renown. Shadow (3). Reaction: After Ser Harry Strickland enters play, choose and stand a Mercenary character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a challenge icon of your choice.
cards.flavor: Homeless Harry looked little like a warrior.

cards.name: Dance of the Dragons
cards.text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] or [intrigue] challenge in which you are the attacking player, instead of the normal claim effects, kneel a unique [targaryen] character to move 2 power from the losing opponent's faction card to your own. Draft format only.

cards.name: Grey Worm
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Grey Worm does not kneel when declared as a defender against an opponent with more cards in their hand than you.

cards.name: Ser Rolly Duckfield
cards.text: While you control Aegon Targaryen, he gains a [military] icon. Interrupt: When a King or Lord character would be killed, discard 1 card from your hand to save it. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Tyrion Lannister
cards.text: Bestow (3). Stealth. Action: Discard 1 gold from Tyrion Lannister to put a Mercenary character into play under your control from any player’s discard pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it on the bottom of its owner's deck. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Black Balaq
cards.text:
Bestow (1).
While Black Balaq is attacking, each defending character gets -X STR. X is the number of gold Black Balaq has.
cards.flavor: He wore a feathered cloak of green and orange, magnificent to behold.

cards.name: Septa Lemore
cards.text: While you control Aegon Targaryen, he gains insight. Interrupt: When Septa Lemore leaves play, choose a [targaryen] character you control with shadow. Return that character to shadows.

cards.name: Grey Worm's Spear
cards.text:
If attached character is Grey Worm, he gains a [power] icon and intimidate.
While attached character is attacking, each defending character gets -1 STR.

cards.name: Our Word Is Good as Gold
cards.text: Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Mercenary character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.
cards.flavor: Our word is good as gold has been their boast since the days of Bittersteel.

cards.name: Beneath the Gold, the Bitter Steel
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose a Mercenary character with 1 or more gold. Until the end of the phase, it gains renown and no attachments except Item. If it has 3 or more gold, it gains insight and intimidate until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Golden Company
cards.text: Bestow (1). While Golden Company has 1 or more gold, it gains renown. Interrupt: When a Mercenary character would be returned to your hand, discard 1 gold from Golden Company to save that character.

cards.name: Long Lances
cards.text: Bestow (2). Intimidate. Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, return Long Lances to its owner's hand unless you discard 1 gold from it. Draft format only.

cards.name: Sorrowful Man
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Sorrowful Man comes out of shadows, switch a character in an opponent's discard pile with a character in that player's dead pile.
cards.flavor: "I am so sorry."

cards.name: Stalwart Shields
cards.text: Assault. No attachments. While Stalwart Shields is participating in a challenge, each Army character an opponent controls loses all keywords.

cards.name: Free Brothers
cards.text: Reaction: After Free Brothers enters play, search your deck for a character with printed cost 3 or lower and place it in your discard pile. Shuffle your deck. Draft format only.

cards.name: Stormcrows
cards.text: Shadow (2). You may marshal Stormcrows into shadows from your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Reaction: After Stormcrows enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character without attachments. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets -1 STR and is killed if its STR is 0. Draft format only.

cards.name: Fighting Pit
cards.text: Challenges Action: Sacrifice Fighting Pit to choose and discard a card from your hand. Then, put a character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your discard pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to its owner's hand. Draft format only.

cards.name: Naught but Ashes
cards.text: Shadow (1). Challenges Action: Choose a participating character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 STR for each card in shadows.
cards.flavor: "Aerys was mad, the whole realm knew it." <cite>Catelyn Stark</cite>

cards.name: Randyll Tarly
cards.text: Renown. Action: Kneel a non-limited location to, either: stand an Army character, or reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a location, draw it (put it into play instead if it is non-limited). (Limit twice per phase.) Draft format only.

cards.name: Margaery Tyrell
cards.text: Renown. Shadow (5). Interrupt: When 1 or more [tyrell] cards are revealed from your hand or deck, choose 1 of those cards and place it in shadows. (Limit twice per round.)
cards.flavor: Margaery was different, though. Sweet and gentle, yet there was a little of her grandmother in her, too.

cards.name: Mace Tyrell
cards.text: Renown. Action: Stand a participating Army character and remove it from the challenge to choose another participating character with equal or lower printed cost. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Willas Tyrell
cards.text:
Insight.
Willas Tyrell contributes his STR to your side during any challenge in which a character you control is attacking or defending alone.
cards.flavor: "Willas has a bad leg but a good heart." <cite>Margaery Tyrell</cite>

cards.name: The Knight of Flowers
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After you initiate a challenge in which a Knight character is attacking alone, stand that character. (Limit once per round.) Draft format only.
cards.flavor: "Grant me your blessing, and a knight to ride beside me with your banner. Let the stag and rose go to battle side by side."

cards.name: Highgarden
cards.text: Action: Kneel Highgarden to reveal up to 3 [tyrell] characters from your hand. For each card revealed this way, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. (You may choose the same character more than once.) Challenges Action: Return a unique [tyrell] character you control to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Garth Greenhand
cards.text: Non-limited location you control only. During a challenge, each unique participating character you control gets +1 STR. +1 Income. Draft format only.

cards.name: Chivalry of the South
cards.text: Interrupt: When a challenge ends in which there are no participating characters, gain 2 power for your faction. (Limit 3 times per round.)
cards.flavor: "Look across the fields, brother. Can you see all those banners?" <cite>Renly Baratheon</cite>

cards.name: Mina Redwyne
cards.text: Reaction: After a House Redwyne or Knight card enters play under your control or your discard pile, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Ser Bryce Caron
cards.text: Each Knight character you control gets +1 STR.

cards.name: Alla Tyrell
cards.text: Interrupt: When Alla Tyrell is revealed from your hand or deck, put her into play.
cards.flavor: Alla Tyrell would be of great help, if Taena could deliver her.

cards.name: Ser Robar Royce
cards.text:
Ser Robar Royce cannot be declared as an attacker or defender in the first challenge each player initiates each round.
-1 Initiative.

cards.name: Dickon Tarly
cards.text: Reaction: After a [tyrell] character you control stands, stand Dickon Tarly. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: His own mother was a thousand leagues south, safe with his sisters and his little brother Dickon in the keep at Horn Hill.

cards.name: Ser Emmon Cuy
cards.text: Bestow (1). Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, discard 1 gold from Ser Emmon Cuy to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. Then, if he has no gold, kill him. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Highgarden Destrier
cards.text:
Limit 1 copy per character. Character with printed STR 3 or lower only. 
Attached character gets +1 STR for each character you control with printed cost 3 or lower.
cards.flavor: Destriers were trained to kick and bite. In war they were a weapon, like the men who rode them.

cards.name: Gilbert of the Vines
cards.text: Challenges Action: Reveal the top X cards of your deck. Choose up to 2 cards revealed this way and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
cards.flavor: “Can you smell the fruit, ser? The perfume of the Arbor. Taste it, my lord, and tell me it isn't the finest, richest wine that's ever touched your tongue.”

cards.name: Blackwater Forces
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After Blackwater Forces stands during a challenge, choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

cards.name: Red-Apple Knight
cards.text: While you control exactly 1 unique Knight character, Red-Apple Knight gets +X STR. X is that character's STR. Draft format only.

cards.name: Brightwater Cavalry
cards.text: Reaction: After Brightwater Cavalry enters play, draw 1 card. Then, choose a card in your hand and place it on top of your deck. Draft format only.

cards.name: Arbor Jester
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Arbor Jester enters play, choose a character and reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Place one of them on the bottom of your deck. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +X STR. X is the printed cost of the other revealed card. Draft format only.

cards.name: Youthful Acolyte
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After Youthful Acolyte enters play during a challenge, stand a participating character you control and remove it from the challenge. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown. Draft format only.

cards.name: Brienne the Blue
cards.text: Action: Choose a character that is attacking or defending alone. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +5 STR. (+10 STR instead if it is a Rainbow Guard character or Brienne of Tarth.)

cards.name: Behold our Bounty
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, return an attacking character to your hand to raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. Draft format only.

cards.name: Beneath the Petals
cards.text: Shadow (0). Action: Choose a character with shadow. Until the end of the phase, that character gains insight and a challenge icon of your choice. Interrupt: When Beneath the Petals is revealed from your deck, place it in shadows and gain 1 gold.

cards.name: Littlefinger
cards.text: Insight. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Littlefinger is participating, each player chooses a card in their hand or shadows area. Then, reveal those cards. If no opponent revealed a card with the same cardtype as you, move 1 power from a card in play to Littlefinger.

cards.name: Vargo Hoat
cards.text: Bestow (2). Reaction: After a card with bestow enters play, it gains 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.) Action: Move 1 gold from Vargo Hoat to a character with 2 or less gold. Until the end of the phase, Vargo Hoat gains that character's keywords.

cards.name: Brienne of Tarth
cards.text: While Brienne of Tarth has an attachment, she gains renown. Brienne of Tarth gets +1 STR for each attachment she has. Draft format only.
cards.flavor: "I promised Jaime. Oathkeeper, he named the sword. I have to try to save her . . . or die in the attempt."

cards.name: Harma Dogshead
cards.text: Pillage. Reaction: After a Wildling character you control discards a card using pillage, search the top 10 cards of your deck for an Item or Weapon attachment with printed cost 2 or lower and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Former Champion
cards.text:
Renown.
Former Champion gets -1 STR for each power it has.
While Former Champion's STR is 3 or lower, it gains a [power] icon and stealth.
While Former Champion's STR is 1 or lower, it gains an [intrigue] icon and intimidate.
cards.designer: Card design by 2008 Overall World Champion, Tzu-Mainn Chen.

cards.name: The Vale of Arryn
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, choose a participating loyal or House Arryn character you control and have it gain 1 power. (2 power instead if The Vale of Arryn is kneeling.) (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: The Moon Door
cards.text: You choose which player wins ties for initiative and dominance. Reaction: After The Moon Door is knelt during a challenge, choose and kill a participating character with printed STR 3 or lower.

cards.name: The Tower of Joy
cards.text: While The Tower of Joy is standing and a unique character you control is attacking or defending alone, it gets +2 STR. Reaction: After a unique character is killed, The Tower of Joy gains 1 power. (Limit once per phase.) Draft format only.

cards.name: All Men Must Die
cards.text: When Revealed: Kill each character. Draft format only.
cards.flavor: Promise me, she had cried, in a room that smelled of blood and roses. Promise me, Ned.

cards.name: Battle on the Green Fork
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, raise the claim value on Battle on the Green Fork by 1 until the end of the phase. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
cards.designer: Card design by 2023 Online World Champion, Jim Hansen.

cards.name: Bran the Builder
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a location, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: The Father
cards.text: Forced Interrupt: When the dominance phase ends, choose a unique non-Army character controlled by each player. Then, return each of those characters to its owner's hand.

cards.name: The Mad King's Command
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, each player chooses up to 3 characters, up to 3 locations, up to 3 attachments, and up to 3 cards in their hand and/or shadows area. Place each card not chosen on the bottom of its owner's deck (cannot be saved).

cards.name: The Maiden
cards.text: While The Maiden is in your used pile, increase the initiative value on your revealed plot card by 2, and the reserve value on your revealed The Seven plot card by 2.

cards.name: The Stranger
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player chooses a character controlled by an opponent. Then, kill each character with the same printed cost as the chosen characters.

cards.name: The Warrior
cards.text: During a challenge in which you control an attacking The Seven character, raise the claim value on The Warrior by 1.

cards.name: Knights of the Vale
cards.text: Assault. No attachments. Challenges Action: Kneel a neutral location with printed cost 1 or higher to choose a defending character that shares a Trait with Knights of the Vale. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. (+4 STR instead if your initiative value is 0.) (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Brave Companions
cards.text: Bestow (1). Pillage. Brave Companions get +1 STR for each character you control with 1 or more gold. Reaction: After you marshal Brave Companions, search the top 10 cards of your deck for an Army character, a Commander character, and a Mercenary character, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Nestor Royce
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Nestor Royce is participating, kneel a neutral location with printed cost 1 or higher to have him gain intimidate or renown until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Septon Utt
cards.text:
Bestow (2).
Each unique character you control with 2 or more gold gains insight.
cards.flavor: "I pray to the Warrior for strength, but the gods made me weak."

cards.name: Bloodraven
cards.text: Insight. No attachments except Old Gods. Reaction: After the plot phase begins, sacrifice Bloodraven to choose an opponent. You may look at that player's chosen plot card before you choose a plot card to reveal this phase.
cards.designer: Card design by 2022 Online World Champion, Alexandre Carry.

cards.name: Septa Unella
cards.text: While Septa Unella is participating in a challenge, treat each other non-The Seven character with 1 or more power as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).
cards.flavor: "Shame upon the sinner, shame, shame."

cards.name: Ser Vardis Egen
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Ser Vardis Egen is defending, sacrifice him to choose an attacking character. Place it in shadows with a shadow token on it (cannot be saved). While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.

cards.name: Balerion
cards.text: Ambush (2). No attachments except Cat. Balerion cannot be killed. Action: Kneel Balerion to discard 1 gold from a card.
cards.flavor: "That's the real king of this castle right there, older than sin and twice as mean."

cards.name: Shagwell
cards.text: Bestow (1). While a character with 1 or more gold has a keyword, each Fool character with 1 or more gold gains that keyword.
cards.flavor: "You mustn't hurt sweet Shagwell, I'm too droll to die."

cards.name: Jinglebell
cards.text: Interrupt: When Jinglebell is killed, search your deck for a card that shares a Trait with him, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
cards.flavor: "A son for a son, heh. But that’s a grandson… and he never was much use." <cite>Walder Frey</cite>

cards.name: The Green Fork
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, put The Green Fork into play from your discard pile. +1 Income.

cards.name: Gulltown
cards.text: Limited. Each player is considered to have 1 additional City plot card in their used pile. +1 Income.

cards.name: The Bloody Gate
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a [military] challenge in which you control a defending character, the winning opponent must choose and discard 1 card from their hand. (Discard 1 card at random from their hand instead if The Bloody Gate is kneeling.)

cards.name: Milkwater Crossing
cards.text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel and sacrifice Milkwater Crossing to have each character lose all keywords and immunities until the end of the phase. +1 Initiative.

cards.name: Sweetsleep
cards.text: Terminal. Treat the printed text box of each other attachment attached to the attached card as if it were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: As High as Honor
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel a neutral location with printed cost 1 or higher to put a neutral card into play from your hand knelt. Then, if that card has the House Arryn trait, stand it.
cards.flavor: The Arryns were proud, and prickly of their honor.

cards.name: All Men Must Serve
cards.text: When Revealed: Kneel each character. Draft format only.

cards.name: At the Tower of Joy
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose a character. Until you reveal a new plot card, that character cannot be killed.
cards.flavor: It was said that Rhaegar had named that place the tower of joy, but for Ned it was a bitter memory.

cards.name: Battle Beneath the Wall
cards.text: When Revealed: Name a challenge type. Until you reveal a new plot card, each player must declare all eligible characters as attackers or defenders during challenges of that type.

cards.name: Battle of the Camps
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge as the attacking player, choose and kneel a character controlled by the losing opponent. (You may kill that character instead if it has the Army trait.) (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Burning the Books
cards.text: When Revealed: Each opponent chooses a non-The Seven attachment they control, if able, and discards it from play. Then, you may discard 1 power from a character you control to initiate this effect again.
cards.flavor: Baelor the Blessed had ordered all Barth's writings destroyed when he came to the Iron Throne.

cards.name: City Blockade
cards.text: Limited cards cannot be marshaled, played, or put into play.

cards.name: City Festival
cards.text: When Revealed: Gain 3 gold. (6 gold instead if there are 2 or more City plot cards in your used pile.)

cards.name: City of Ice
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, choose an attacking character and have it gain 1 power. (Any player may initiate this ability unless there are 2 or more City plot cards in your used pile.) (Limit twice per phase.) Draft format only.

cards.name: City of Shadows
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose a card you control with shadow and return it to your hand. (You may return it to shadows instead if there is a City plot card in your used pile.)

cards.name: Enemies in Every Shadow
cards.text: While there are no cards in shadows, each character you control gets +1 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge, choose a card in shadows controlled by the losing opponent, and discard it. If that card is a character, place it in its owner's dead pile.

cards.name: For the Realm
cards.text: Reduce the cost of the first Army or Stronghold card you marshal this round by 4.

cards.name: Melisandre's Gambit
cards.text: When Revealed: You may kill a character you control (cannot be saved). If you do, put another character into play from your dead or discard pile. Draft format only.
cards.flavor: "Call it what you will. Glamor, seeming, illusion. R'hllor is Lord of Light, Jon Snow, and it is given to his servants to weave with it, as others weave with thread." <cite>Melisandre</cite>

cards.name: Open Revolt
cards.text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost an [intrigue] challenge this phase, gain 2 power for your faction. (4 power instead if there are 3 or more Scheme plot cards in your used pile.) Draft format only.

cards.name: Strained Reserves
cards.text: Each player cannot marshal or put into play more than 2 characters, locations, or attachments this round. (4 characters, locations, or attachments instead if that player has a Summer plot card revealed.)

cards.name: Striking at Dawn
cards.text: Each character's STR cannot be increased or reduced by card effects.
cards.flavor: “We shall see, brother. Come the dawn, we shall see.” - Stannis Baratheon

cards.name: The Crone
cards.text: Each character with printed STR 1 or lower cannot leave play.

cards.name: The Defiance of Duskendale
cards.text: Reaction: After a location is knelt by assault, discard it from play.
cards.flavor: "Unless I returned with the king by dawn of the following day, he would take the town with steel and fire, he told me." <cite>Ser Barristan Selmy</cite>

cards.name: The Mother
cards.text: Reaction: After a character enters play under an opponent's control, if another character entered play under that player's control this round, draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: The Pointy End
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose a character. If there are 2 or more attachments attached to that character, discard each attachment from it. Otherwise, discard each duplicate and each power from it.

cards.name: The Smith
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel an attachment to choose and kneel a location.

cards.name: Gulltown City Guard
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reduce the cost to marshal Gulltown City Guard by 1 for each City plot card in your used pile (to a minimum of 1).

cards.name: Maester of the Eyrie
cards.text:
Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Maester of the Eyrie is participating, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Place any number of those cards on the bottom of the deck, and the others on top, in any order.
+1 Reserve.
<b>Draft format only.</ b>

cards.name: King's Landing Mob
cards.text: Assault. Reaction: After a location is knelt by assault, kill King's Landing Mob to discard that location from play.
cards.flavor: "You were glad enough to see my face when the mob had you, though. Remember?" <cite>The Hound</cite>

cards.name: Mummer's Troupe
cards.text: Mummer's Troupe gets +1 STR for each gold it has. While it has 3 or more gold, it gains renown. Reaction: After Mummer's Troupe stands, move 1 gold from the treasury to it or a card you control without gold. (Limit once per round.) Draft format only.

cards.name: Harrenhal Cupbearer
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Harrenhal Cupbearer is participating, return it to shadows to choose and kneel a character with printed cost 5 or lower controlled by the losing opponent.

cards.name: Thenns
cards.text: Assault. Pillage. No attachments except Weapon. Thenns cannot target a location using assault unless each character you declare as an attacker has the Army or Wildling trait.
cards.flavor: The Thenns were hardened warriors, and more disciplined than the common run of wildling.

cards.name: Wandering Knight
cards.text:
Wandering Knight gets +1 STR for each non-limited location you control. While its STR is 5 or greater, it gains a [power] icon.
Draft format only.
cards.flavor: "Other knights serve the lords who keep them, or from whom they hold their lands, but we serve where we will, for men whose causes we believe in." <cite>Ser Arlan of Pennytree</cite>

cards.name: King's Landing Smuggler
cards.text: Interrupt: When King's Landing Smuggler leaves play, place 1 gold from the treasury on a card without gold.

cards.name: Squire
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Squire to reduce the cost of the next Army or Knight character you marshal this phase by 1. (By 2 instead if that character's printed cost is 6 or higher.)

cards.name: Gulltown Merchant
cards.text: Marshaling Action: If there is a City plot card revealed, kneel Gulltown Merchant to gain 1 gold.
cards.flavor: "There are several branches of House Arryn scattered across the Vale, all as proud as they are penurious, save for the Gulltown Arryns, who had the rare good sense to marry merchants." <cite>Littlefinger</cite>

cards.name: The Highroad
cards.text: Limited. Action: Kneel and sacrifice The Highroad to reduce the cost of the next non-character card you marshal or play this phase by 2. +1 Income.

cards.name: Quill and Parchment
cards.text: Ambush (1). Attached character gets +1 STR. Action: Kneel and sacrifice Quill and Parchment to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). Draft format only.

cards.name: Face Mask
cards.text: Character you control only. Attached character gains the named Trait. Reaction: After Face Mask enters play, name a Trait. Draft format only.
cards.flavor: "Your name will be a lie, and the very face you wear will not be your own." <cite>Plague Face</cite>

cards.name: "Florian and Jonquil"
cards.text: Action: Choose a unique character with printed cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown. Then, attach "Florian and Jonquil" to that character as an attachment with the text: "Terminal. Attached character gains the Fool and Knight traits."

cards.name: "A Thousand Eyes, and One"
cards.text: Action: Kneel your faction card to choose an opponent and, either: look at their hand, or look at each card in their shadows area. Draw 1 card.
cards.flavor: How many eyes does Lord Bloodraven have?

cards.name: Calm as Still Water
cards.text: Interrupt: When a character with printed cost 3 or lower would be killed, save it and return it to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Arya took a breath to still her soul.

cards.name: Hot Pie
cards.text: Immune to Omen card effects. Marshaling Action: Kneel Hot Pie to place a pie token on a character. That character gets +1 STR. Draft format only.
cards.flavor: "Everyone was yelling stuff. Hot Pie yelled hot pie. He must have yelled it a hundred times." <cite>Arya Stark</cite>

cards.name: Sealing the Pact
cards.text: When you announce Sealing the Pact as your agenda, name 1 faction. You may include cards from that faction in your draw deck and plot deck. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating in-faction character, kneel your faction card to have an out-of-faction character you control gain 1 power. Draft format only.

cards.name: Unknown and Unknowable
cards.text: When you announce Unknown and Unknowable as your agenda, name 2 factions. You may include cards from those factions in your draw deck and plot deck. Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a Trait of your choice. Draft format only.

cards.name: Pass Beneath the Shadow
cards.text: You may include cards with the printed shadow keyword from any faction in your deck. Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows (choose 1 that you have not chosen this round): - Gain 1 gold. - Pay 1 gold to draw 1 card. - Give a character +2 STR until the end of the phase. Draft format only.

cards.name: Seeking Fortunes
cards.text: You may include cards with the printed bestow keyword and locations from any faction in your deck. Action: Kneel your faction card to either: reduce the cost of the next card with bestow or location you marshal this phase by 1, or move 1 gold from your gold pool to a card you control without gold. Draft format only.

cards.name: Join Forces
cards.text: When you announce Join Forces as your agenda, name a Trait. You may include cards with that printed Trait from any faction in your draw deck and plot deck. Reduce the cost of the first card with the named Trait you marshal or play each round by 1. Draft format only.

cards.name: Desperate Hope
cards.text: You may include cards from any faction in your draw deck and plot deck. You cannot spend more than 6 gold during setup. -1 Income. -1 Initiative. -1 Reserve. Draft format only.

cards.name: Faceless Man
cards.text: Reaction: After Faceless Man enters play, it gains a Trait and challenge icon of your choice. Draft format only.

cards.name: Pentoshi Trader
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Pentoshi Trader to reduce the cost of the next character you marshal this phase by 1. Draft format only.

cards.name: Holdfast Village
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Holdfast Village to reduce the cost of the next card you marshal (or marshal into shadows) this phase by 1. Action: Sacrifice Holdfast Village to, either: gain 1 gold, or draw 1 card. Draft format only.

cards.name: Market Square
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel and sacrifice Market Square to gain 2 gold. Draft format only.

cards.name: Feast or Famine
cards.text: When Revealed: Either, increase the gold value on Feast or Famine by 5, or increase the claim value on Feast or Famine by 2. Draft format only.

cards.name: The Pale Mare
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player chooses any number of characters they control with total printed cost 10 or lower. Kill each character not chosen (cannot be saved). Draft format only.

cards.name: City Fair
cards.text: When Revealed: Draw 1 card. (2 cards instead if there is a City plot card in your used pile.) Draft format only.

cards.name: Manning the City Walls
cards.text: When Revealed: Put a character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand. (Printed cost 6 or lower instead if there is a City plot card in your used pile.) Draft format only.

cards.name: Razed to the Ground
cards.text: During the first [military] challenge you initiate during the challenges phase, raise the claim value on Razed to the Ground by 1. Draft format only.

cards.name: Bitter Accusation
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, draw X cards, where X is the claim value on Bitter Accusation. Then, choose and discard 1 card from your hand. Draft format only.

cards.name: Royal Decree
cards.text: You may initiate an additional [power] challenge during the challenges phase. Draft format only.

cards.name: Jousting Contest
cards.text: Each player cannot declare more than 1 character as an attacker or defender in each challenge. Draft format only.

cards.name: Biting Cold
cards.text: When Revealed: Place each character with printed cost 3 or lower without attachments on the bottom of its owner's deck. Draft format only.

cards.name: Secrets of Oldtown
cards.text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a Trait or challenge icon of your choice. (Limit once per round.) Draft format only.
